Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.testIamPermissions' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. The operation lacks a summary entirely, making it difficult for AI agents to quickly understand its purpose. The description, while detailed, needs restructuring for clarity: (1) Add explicit mention of 'BigQuery connection' to provide domain context; (2) Clarify the input (authenticated caller, connection resource) and output (list of permissions); (3) Emphasize the distinction between this operation's use case (UI/CLI building) versus authorization checking; (4) Better highlight the 'fail open' behavior as a critical caveat. These improvements help AI agents understand when to invoke this operation and what to expect.

data.current_description: Returns permissions that a caller has on the specified resource. If the resource does not exist, this will return an empty set of permissions, not a `NOT_FOUND` error. Note: This operation is designed to be used for building permission-aware UIs and command-line tools, not for authorization checking. This operation may "fail open" without warning.
data.summary_suggestion: Test IAM permissions on BigQuery connection
data.description_suggestion: Tests which IAM permissions the authenticated caller has on the specified BigQuery connection resource. Returns a list of permissions the caller possesses. If the connection resource does not exist, returns an empty permission set rather than a NOT_FOUND error. This operation is intended for building permission-aware UIs and CLI tools, not for authorization enforcement. Note: This operation may fail open without warning and should not be used as the sole authorization mechanism.
data.reasoning: The operation lacks a summary entirely, making it difficult for AI agents to quickly understand its purpose. The description, while detailed, needs restructuring for clarity: (1) Add explicit mention of 'BigQuery connection' to provide domain context; (2) Clarify the input (authenticated caller, connection resource) and output (list of permissions); (3) Emphasize the distinction between this operation's use case (UI/CLI building) versus authorization checking; (4) Better highlight the 'fail open' behavior as a critical caveat. These improvements help AI agents understand when to invoke this operation and what to expect.

message: Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.delete' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about permanence, input requirements (resource name), and output format. Added context about irreversibility and explicit mention of what is deleted to help AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation.

data.current_description: Deletes connection and associated credential.
data.summary_suggestion: Delete a BigQuery connection and credentials
data.description_suggestion: Deletes the specified BigQuery connection and its associated credential. This operation permanently removes the connection configuration and cannot be undone. Requires the connection resource name as input. Returns an empty response on successful deletion.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about permanence, input requirements (resource name), and output format. Added context about irreversibility and explicit mention of what is deleted to help AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation.

message: Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is too brief and lacks input/output specificity. Added explicit mention of resource name parameter and clarified that the full Connection object is returned, improving AI agent understanding of what data will be available.

data.current_description: Returns specified connection.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a BigQuery connection configuration
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the configuration details of a specified BigQuery connection. Requires the connection resource name as input. Returns the complete Connection object containing connection properties, authentication method, and metadata.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too brief and lacks input/output specificity. Added explicit mention of resource name parameter and clarified that the full Connection object is returned, improving AI agent understanding of what data will be available.

message: Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.patch' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details. Missing summary. Description mentions credential reset but lacks clarity about field mask requirement and return value. Restructured to emphasize the field mask mechanism and clarify that the updated Connection object is returned, making it clearer for AI agents to understand the update mechanism and security implications.

data.current_description: Updates the specified connection. For security reasons, also resets credential if connection properties are in the update field mask.
data.summary_suggestion: Update BigQuery connection configuration
data.description_suggestion: Updates the specified BigQuery connection with new configuration values. Accepts a Connection object with fields to be updated via field mask. Important: If connection properties are included in the update field mask, credentials are automatically reset for security purposes. Returns the updated Connection object.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description mentions credential reset but lacks clarity about field mask requirement and return value. Restructured to emphasize the field mask mechanism and clarify that the updated Connection object is returned, making it clearer for AI agents to understand the update mechanism and security implications.

message: Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks input parameter details (parent path, pagination parameters) and output structure information. Added specificity about required parent parameter, pagination support, and the ListConnectionsResponse schema to help AI agents understand how to paginate through results.

data.current_description: Returns a list of connections in the given project.
data.summary_suggestion: List BigQuery connections in a project
data.description_suggestion: Lists all BigQuery connections in the specified project and location. Requires the parent resource path (project and location). Supports pagination via optional page size and page token parameters. Returns a ListConnectionsResponse containing an array of Connection objects and a next page token if more results exist.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks input parameter details (parent path, pagination parameters) and output structure information. Added specificity about required parent parameter, pagination support, and the ListConnectionsResponse schema to help AI agents understand how to paginate through results.

message: Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.create' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is too generic and lacks input/output details. Added clarity about what must be provided (parent path and Connection configuration) and what is returned (Connection object with assigned resource name), enabling AI agents to understand the creation workflow and resource naming.

data.current_description: Creates a new connection.
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new BigQuery connection
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new BigQuery connection to an external data source in the specified project and location. Requires the parent resource path and a Connection object with configuration details including connection properties and authentication credentials. Returns the newly created Connection object with assigned resource name and metadata.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too generic and lacks input/output details. Added clarity about what must be provided (parent path and Connection configuration) and what is returned (Connection object with assigned resource name), enabling AI agents to understand the creation workflow and resource naming.

message: Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.getIamPolicy' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details. Missing summary. Description is generic and doesn't specify it's for connections. Added domain context (IAM, BigQuery connection) and clarified input requirement (resource name) to make it clear this operation is specific to connection access control management.

data.current_description: Gets the access control policy for a resource. Returns an empty policy if the resource exists and does not have a policy set.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve IAM policy for a connection
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy for the specified BigQuery connection resource. Requires the connection resource name. Returns a Policy object containing role bindings and access controls. Returns an empty policy if the resource exists but has no policy set.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is generic and doesn't specify it's for connections. Added domain context (IAM, BigQuery connection) and clarified input requirement (resource name) to make it clear this operation is specific to connection access control management.

message: Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.setIamPolicy' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks input details (SetIamPolicyRequest structure) and output information (returns Policy object). Added clarity about required inputs and return value, and contextualized error conditions to help AI agents understand when this operation might fail and what to expect on success.

data.current_description: Sets the access control policy on the specified resource. Replaces any existing policy. Can return `NOT_FOUND`, `INVALID_ARGUMENT`, and `PERMISSION_DENIED` errors.
data.summary_suggestion: Set IAM policy for a connection
data.description_suggestion: Sets the Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy for the specified BigQuery connection, replacing any existing policy. Requires the connection resource name and a SetIamPolicyRequest containing the new Policy object with desired role bindings. Returns the updated Policy object. May return NOT_FOUND, INVALID_ARGUMENT, or PERMISSION_DENIED errors.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks input details (SetIamPolicyRequest structure) and output information (returns Policy object). Added clarity about required inputs and return value, and contextualized error conditions to help AI agents understand when this operation might fail and what to expect on success.

Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.testIamPermissions' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. The operation lacks a summary entirely, making it difficult for AI agents to quickly understand its purpose. The description, while detailed, needs restructuring for clarity: (1) Add explicit mention of 'BigQuery connection' to provide domain context; (2) Clarify the input (authenticated caller, connection resource) and output (list of permissions); (3) Emphasize the distinction between this operation's use case (UI/CLI building) versus authorization checking; (4) Better highlight the 'fail open' behavior as a critical caveat. These improvements help AI agents understand when to invoke this operation and what to expect.

data.current_description: Returns permissions that a caller has on the specified resource. If the resource does not exist, this will return an empty set of permissions, not a `NOT_FOUND` error. Note: This operation is designed to be used for building permission-aware UIs and command-line tools, not for authorization checking. This operation may "fail open" without warning.
data.summary_suggestion: Test IAM permissions on BigQuery connection
data.description_suggestion: Tests which IAM permissions the authenticated caller has on the specified BigQuery connection resource. Returns a list of permissions the caller possesses. If the connection resource does not exist, returns an empty permission set rather than a NOT_FOUND error. This operation is intended for building permission-aware UIs and CLI tools, not for authorization enforcement. Note: This operation may fail open without warning and should not be used as the sole authorization mechanism.
data.reasoning: The operation lacks a summary entirely, making it difficult for AI agents to quickly understand its purpose. The description, while detailed, needs restructuring for clarity: (1) Add explicit mention of 'BigQuery connection' to provide domain context; (2) Clarify the input (authenticated caller, connection resource) and output (list of permissions); (3) Emphasize the distinction between this operation's use case (UI/CLI building) versus authorization checking; (4) Better highlight the 'fail open' behavior as a critical caveat. These improvements help AI agents understand when to invoke this operation and what to expect.

data.current_description: Deletes connection and associated credential.
data.summary_suggestion: Delete a BigQuery connection and credentials
data.description_suggestion: Deletes the specified BigQuery connection and its associated credential attributes. This operation permanently removes the connection configuration and cannot be undone. Requires the connection resource name as input. Returns an empty response on successful deletion.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about permanence, input requirements (resource name), and output format. Added context about irreversibility and explicit mention of credential deletion to help AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation.

data.current_description: Returns specified connection.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a BigQuery connection configuration
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the configuration details of a specified BigQuery connection. Requires the connection resource name as input. Returns the complete Connection object containing connection properties, authentication method, and metadata, excluding sensitive credential attributes.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too brief and lacks input/output specificity. Added clarity about what resource name is required, what the Connection object contains, and explicitly noted that credentials are excluded for security reasons, which is important for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.patch' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details. Missing summary. Description mentions credential reset behavior but lacks clarity about field mask usage, partial updates, and return value. Enhanced to explain field mask parameter, partial update capability, and explicit return value for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Updates the specified connection. For security reasons, also resets credential if connection properties are in the update field mask.
data.summary_suggestion: Update BigQuery connection configuration
data.description_suggestion: Updates the specified BigQuery connection with new configuration values. Accepts a Connection object and an optional update field mask to specify which fields to modify. For security reasons, if connection properties are included in the update field mask, the associated credential is automatically reset and must be re-provided. Returns the updated Connection object.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description mentions credential reset behavior but lacks clarity about field mask usage, partial updates, and return value. Enhanced to explain field mask parameter, partial update capability, and explicit return value for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks input parameter details (parent path, pagination parameters) and output format specifics. Added clarity about required parent parameter, pagination support, and explicit mention of ListConnectionsResponse schema to help AI agents understand pagination and result structure.

data.current_description: Returns a list of connections in the given project.
data.summary_suggestion: List BigQuery connections in a project
data.description_suggestion: Lists all BigQuery connections within a specified project and location. Requires the parent resource path (project and location) as input. Supports pagination through optional page size and page token parameters. Returns a ListConnectionsResponse containing an array of Connection objects and a next page token for pagination.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks input parameter details (parent path, pagination parameters) and output format specifics. Added clarity about required parent parameter, pagination support, and explicit mention of ListConnectionsResponse schema to help AI agents understand pagination and result structure.

data.current_description: Creates a new connection.
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new BigQuery connection
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new BigQuery connection to an external data source within a specified project and location. Requires the parent resource path and a Connection object containing configuration parameters such as connection type, authentication method, and external data source properties. Returns the newly created Connection object with a system-generated resource name.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too generic and lacks input/output details. Added clarity about required parent parameter, what Connection object should contain (connection type, auth method, properties), and that a resource name is generated on creation, which helps AI agents understand the complete operation flow.

message: Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.getIamPolicy' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details. Missing summary. Description is generic and doesn't specify it's for connections or mention the request schema. Added context about connection-specific usage, explicit mention of GetIamPolicyRequest input, and clarified that Policy object is returned for better AI agent understanding of IAM operations.

data.current_description: Gets the access control policy for a resource. Returns an empty policy if the resource exists and does not have a policy set.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve IAM policy for a connection
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy for a specified BigQuery connection resource. Requires the connection resource name as input via GetIamPolicyRequest. Returns a Policy object containing role bindings and access controls. Returns an empty policy if the resource exists but has no policy set.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is generic and doesn't specify it's for connections or mention the request schema. Added context about connection-specific usage, explicit mention of GetIamPolicyRequest input, and clarified that Policy object is returned for better AI agent understanding of IAM operations.

message: Operation 'bigqueryconnection.projects.locations.connections.setIamPolicy' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks input details (SetIamPolicyRequest structure) and output information (returns Policy object). Enhanced to clarify that SetIamPolicyRequest is required, what it contains, that Policy object is returned, and explicitly listed error conditions for better AI agent error handling and understanding.

data.current_description: Sets the access control policy on the specified resource. Replaces any existing policy. Can return `NOT_FOUND`, `INVALID_ARGUMENT`, and `PERMISSION_DENIED` errors.
data.summary_suggestion: Set IAM policy for a connection
data.description_suggestion: Sets the Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy for a specified BigQuery connection resource, replacing any existing policy. Requires the connection resource name and a SetIamPolicyRequest containing the new Policy object with desired role bindings. Returns the updated Policy object. May return NOT_FOUND, INVALID_ARGUMENT, or PERMISSION_DENIED errors if the resource doesn't exist, the policy is invalid, or the caller lacks permissions.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks input details (SetIamPolicyRequest structure) and output information (returns Policy object). Enhanced to clarify that SetIamPolicyRequest is required, what it contains, that Policy object is returned, and explicitly listed error conditions for better AI agent error handling and understanding.

data.current_description: Gets the access control policy for a resource. Returns an empty policy if the resource exists and does not have a policy set.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve IAM policy for a connection
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy for a specified BigQuery connection resource. Requires the connection resource name as input via GetIamPolicyRequest. Returns a Policy object containing role bindings and access controls. Returns an empty policy if the resource exists but has no policy set.

data.current_description: Sets the access control policy on the specified resource. Replaces any existing policy. Can return `NOT_FOUND`, `INVALID_ARGUMENT`, and `PERMISSION_DENIED` errors.
data.summary_suggestion: Set IAM policy for a connection
data.description_suggestion: Sets the Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy for a specified BigQuery connection resource, replacing any existing policy. Requires the connection resource name and a SetIamPolicyRequest containing the new Policy object with desired role bindings. Returns the updated Policy object. May return NOT_FOUND, INVALID_ARGUMENT, or PERMISSION_DENIED errors if the resource doesn't exist, the policy is invalid, or the caller lacks permissions.
